amendment.description: Amendment sought to grant California a waiver of the reformulated gas rules of the Clean Air Act requiring 2 percent oxygen, only if its reformulation will achieve equivalent or greater emissions reductions.
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment numbered 6 printed in House Rept. 107-178 to grant California a waiver of the 2% oxygen rule only if its gasoline will achieve "equivalent or greater emissions reductions" than is required under federal law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cox amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 125 - 300 (Roll no. 313).
